name: darsy
description: Courses LMS website learning easier than before

scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.npm-i-PKG: concurrently "cd backend && npm i" "cd frontend && npm i"
scripts.pushENV: concurrently "cd backend && npx --yes dotenv-vault@1.24.0 push --yes" "cd frontend && npx --yes dotenv-vault@1.24.0 push --yes"
scripts.pullENV: concurrently "cd backend && npx --yes dotenv-vault@1.24.0 pull --yes" "cd frontend && npx --yes dotenv-vault@1.24.0 pull --yes"
